text: Destination Tokyo is a 1943 American World War II adventure movie directed by Delmer Daves and starring Cary Grant, John Garfield, Alan Hale, Sr., Tom Tully, John Forsythe, John Ridgely, Dane Clark, Warner Anderson, Eleanor Parker, Faye Emerson. It was distributed by Warner Bros. and was nominated for an Academy Award in 1944. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 war movies Category:1940s American adventure movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by Delmer Daves
title: Destination Tokyo
